TITLE: Apprenticeship
DEF: On-the-job training combined with formal education and capped by a recognized certificate of achievement.
TASK: The Apprenticeship pattern integrates formal education with on-the-job training, equipping students with hands-on experiences, practical skills, and industry-specific knowledge. By balancing work and education, tailoring learning, and fostering skill development, APPNT promotes the use of AI technologies to streamline learning processes, foster self-directed learning, and provide immediate feedback.
